name: Cosmic 99 Welcome to Sector-A
description:
Welcome to Sector-A!!

-Story: You were in the ship named Cosmic 99 that has 2 sectors named Sector-A and Sector-B. And you are the Captain you are at Sector-A and you need to check everything in Sector-A if they all work fine if not the Computer will manage it. 

Good luck...

Kindly Download the Fonts before playing the game :)
